attributes.action: Scottish people for the inclusion of Tom Cleverly in the England World Cup starting line up
attributes.additional_details: In light of the petition in England to prevent Roy Hodgson from including Tom Cleverly in England World Cup squad,  we along with the Welsh, Irish,  Northern Irish,  French, German, Argentinan, Afghani and Norwegian communities demand that not only Demand his inclusion in the squad,  but that he starts. Preferably up front.
